div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Until end of turn, all your attacks gain +1 accuracy (reduce target number by 1). Your next attack this turn cannot miss (5+ becomes 4+, etc).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Discard 1 card from deck. Your next attack cannot miss (auto-hit) but deals -2 damage.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Reroll 1 Attack Die on your next attack this turn.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 6 damage. This attack cannot miss. If attacking from rear arc (hex 4), deal 8 damage instead.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Target enemy's next attack: +2 to target number (harder for them to hit). Draw 1 card.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 5 damage. If you've discarded cards this turn (via Blood Offering or other effects), deal 7 damage instead.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 4 damage. If target has killed an ally this mission, deal 6 damage instead (vengeance).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Deal 6 damage. Ignore 2 Defense. Discard 1 card to deal +2 damage (total 8).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: When an ally within 3 hexes is attacked, redirect that attack to yourself. Reduce damage by 2. Ally protection.

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 20px; color: #cccccc; line-height: 1.5;
div.p: Whenever you discard cards (via Blood Offering, self-harm, etc), gain +1 accuracy on your next attack (reduce target number by 1).

div.style: font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 17px; color: #666666; font-style: italic; text-align: center; line-height: 1.4;
